name: Developer Roadmap Interactive Learning System
description: Comprehensive interactive learning plugin with 7 specialized agents covering 70+ developer roles and career paths from the developer-roadmap project. Features hands-on projects, real-world implementations, and expert guidance.
author: Plugin Agent Marketplace

agents.name: Frontend & Web Technologies
agents.description: Expert guidance on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Vue, Angular and modern web development

agents.name: Backend & Database Systems
agents.description: Comprehensive backend development covering Node.js, Python, Java, Spring Boot, databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis), and SQL

agents.name: Full-Stack & Framework Integration
agents.description: Full-stack development expertise with Next.js, Angular advanced patterns, and framework integration strategies

agents.name: DevOps & Cloud Infrastructure
agents.description: Infrastructure and deployment knowledge covering DevOps, AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, Cloudflare, and System Design

agents.name: Data, AI & Machine Learning
agents.description: Data science and AI/ML expertise for Data Analysts, Engineers, ML Engineers, AI Engineers, Data Scientists, MLOps, Prompt Engineering, and AI Agents

agents.name: Security & Quality Assurance
agents.description: Security and testing excellence covering Cyber Security, QA testing methodologies, and compliance frameworks

agents.name: Advanced Technologies & Leadership
agents.description: Specialized languages (Golang, Rust, C++, Blockchain) and leadership roles (Product Manager, Engineering Manager, UX Design, Technical Writer)
